items.title: Co-founder of Zenfeed, http://www.zenfeed.me/
items.organization: Zenfeed srl
descriptions: Zenfeed is a smart news reader able to sort news according to user interests. I am responsible of research activities. Zenfeed was financed by the Principi Attivi 2012 program of the Apulia Region. Zenfeed won the business competition “Valore Assoluto” organized by the Camera di Commercio of Bari. Zenfeed received an early stage funding by United Ventures and LVenture Group. Zenfeed has been participated in the 2014 Startup School organized by the Mind the Bridge Foundation at San Francisco

items.title: Co-founder of QuestionCube, http://www.questioncube.com/
items.organization: QuestionCube srl
descriptions: QuestionCube develops solutions for natural language processing, semantic search and question answering. I am responsible of the research unit about natural language processing. QuestionCube won the Lamarck prize for young innovative startups, and was one of the winner of the Apps4Italy competition organized by the Forum PA
